de.codecrafters.tableview

Class TableHeaderAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.codecrafters.tableview.TableHeaderAdapter
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    SimpleTableHeaderAdapter

    public abstract class TableHeaderAdapter
extends java.lang.Object
    The abstract implementation of an adapter used to bring data to a TableHeaderView.
    Author:
    ISchwarz

      • getContext

        public android.content.Context getContext()
        Gives the android.content.Context of this adapter. (Hint: use this method in the getHeaderView()-method to programmatically initialize new views.)
        Returns:
        The android.content.Context of this adapter.

        public LayoutInflater getLayoutInflater()
        Gives the LayoutInflater of this adapter. (Hint: use this method in the getHeaderView()-method to inflate xml-layout-files.)

      • getResources

        public Resources getResources()
        Gives the Resources of this adapter. (Hint: use this method in the getHeaderView()-method to resolve resources.)
        Returns:
        The Resources of the context of this adapter.

      • getHeaderView

        public abstract View getHeaderView(int columnIndex,
                 ViewGroup parentView)
        Method that gives the header views for the different columns.
        Parameters:
        columnIndex - The index of the column to return the header view.
        parentView - The view to which the returned view will be added.
        Returns:
        The created header view for the given column.
